title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Participating in deep conversations with loved ones is more fruitful if the interactions are pleasant and insightful. Its often difficult to discuss sensitive subjects without strong emotions blasting the chat off course. But the roiling Scorpio Moons temperate sextile to bottomless Pluto portends well for allowing open-hearted talks to simmer rather than boil over. So, if an issue or insult weighs heavy on your mind, approach the topic candidly. Start by expressing your feelings instead of recounting the mistakes made by anyone else. Skip the blame game and aim for a peaceful resolution while still making your point. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
